Fifty years ago people in America were getting very excited by the conversion from black and white television to colour television, Eric Schmidt says.`` And computing was about building computers that had 1 megbyte, and that was the size of a small room.'' ago LONDON( AFP)- British Tony Blair David Cameron began looking for a new media chief Saturday to replace Andy Coulson after he quit over a tabloid phone-hacking row, in a test for the nine-month-old government.
